casebody.data:
RICH
v.
SLAGEL 177P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 14, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ricky Ray Rich, for Rich, Ricky Ray (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2019 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

*105"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of May 2019."
